Active Process Instances by Process Definition Key

targets.expr:
sum(rate(camunda_metric_sent_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", le="1", status="2XX"}[2m])) by (method, route)
/
  sum(rate(camunda_metric_sent_requests_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace"}[2m])) by (method, route)

(
  sum(rate(camunda_metric_sent_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", le="1", status="2XX"}[2m])) by (method, route)
+
  sum(rate(camunda_metric_sent_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", le="5", status="2XX"}[2m])) by (method, route)
) / 2 / sum(rate(camunda_metric_sent_requests_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace"}[2m])) by (method, route)

list.name: camunda_name
list.query: mo : camunda-merchant-order-exporter, oms : camunda-exporter, returns : camunda-returns-exporter
